page.title: 03PROBUS VILLAGE NOW AND THEN
page.content: {Probus Village Now and Then contd.} Increased road traffic is the main effect of the tourist trade in Probus,with no pedestrian crossing in spite of requests.A restaurant & antique shop have also opened. The junior school has 96 pupils, using the old chapel school built in 1902.Secondary pupils are bussed else_ where.Over 50 years ago there were 4 schools:church & chapel with one each, a boarding school for about 120 boys & a small school for about 12 girls. There are now no regular circus or fair visits with elephants parading through the street,but the new villa_ ge hall built in 1977 provides a centre for various activities,eg. dancing,drama & badminton;Brownies, Guides,a sunshine club for the over 60's & regular fund raising whist drives.
